author: legoguy_3000_
title: wheels pick up dust
review:
I got this free with the newspaper.

Pros:
stands up well
good colour scheme
good for a promo
easy to build
glow-in-the-dark bits

Cons:
no alternate models
small instructions,could get lost
wheels pick up dust

very good for a promo 4/5
